cgcloud__Order__c.name: cgcloud__Order__c
cgcloud__Order__c.description: Stores the header details of the order entry.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__ASN__c.description: Advanced shipping notice number that the supplier provides for a special delivery.

cgcloud__ATM_Confirmation_Nr__c.description: Contains the confirmation number of the receipt that an Automated Teller Machine (ATM) prints.

cgcloud__Accountable__c.description: The system shows the Initiator of the order as the initial accountable.

cgcloud__Actual_Check_Out_Quantity__c.description: Total product checkout quantity for the tour in question as actually counted by the tour executing user.

cgcloud__Actual_Check_Out_Type__c.description: Checkout type (method) that's must be applied in the product checkout document based on the given template settings.

cgcloud__Bank_Name__c.description: Contains the name of the bank.

cgcloud__Bill_Recipient_Account__c.description: Reference to the bill to of the order entry.

cgcloud__Calculation_Schema__c.description: Schema that's used to calculate the order with complex pricing.

cgcloud__Calculation_Time__c.description: Time of the last complex pricing calculation for this order.

cgcloud__Cancel_Reason__c.description: Specifies a reason for the cancellation of the sales document.

cgcloud__Check_Out_Quantity__c.description: Total product checkout quantity for the tour in question as given by the HOST interface.

cgcloud__Check_Out_Type__c.description: Specifies the currency of the order based on the sales org currency of the order template object. It must have the same picklist values as the sales org currency field.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Specifies the currency of the order based on the sales org currency of the order template object. It must have the same picklist values as the sales org currency field.

cgcloud__Delivery_Date__c.description: By default: next day. Delivery date calculation is customized frequently.

cgcloud__Delivery_Recipient__c.description: Reference to the delivery recipient of the selected account.

cgcloud__Document_Transaction_Type__c.description: Specifies how to manage a sales document.

cgcloud__Document_Type__c.description: Specifies the type of the order document to distinguish DSD and non-DSD order entries.

cgcloud__Gross_Total_Value_Receipt__c.description: Total value of the order entry in the order/receipt currency.

cgcloud__Gross_Total_Value__c.description: Gross total value (domestic currency) of the sales document including relevant sales taxes. The system calculates its value based on the respective sales document item template settings.

cgcloud__Header_Discount_Percentage__c.description: Percentage value of the header discount.

cgcloud__Initiation_Date__c.description: Date of initiation of this sales document.

cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_1__c.description: First reference to the inventory as defined in the order template.

cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_2__c.description: Second reference to the inventory as defined in the order template.

cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_3__c.description: Third reference to the inventory as defined in the order template.

cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_4__c.description: Fourth reference to the inventory as defined in the order template.

cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_5__c.description: Fifth reference to the inventory as defined in the order template.

cgcloud__Merchandise_Value_Receipt__c.description: Merchandise value (value of goods) in receipt currency, not including header discount.

cgcloud__Mobility_Release__c.description: Indicates whether the order was released on Mobility.

cgcloud__Order_Account__c.description: Lookup field to capture the customer for which the order is created.

cgcloud__Order_Date__c.description: Day on which the customer committed to the sales document. For order entries, this is the order date.

cgcloud__Order_Id__c.description: Specifies the user-readable number that's used for print-outs and customer communication.

cgcloud__Order_Template__c.description: Reference to the Order Template for Order Entry.

cgcloud__Paid_Amount_Receipt__c.description: Paid amount of the order entry in domestic currency. The paid amount is a gross value.

cgcloud__Payer__c.description: Reference to the payer of the order.

cgcloud__Payment_Method__c.description: Describes the manner of the remuneration.

cgcloud__Payment_Reason__c.description: Specifies a reason that leads to modifying the document handling regarding payments.

cgcloud__Payment__c.description: Represents the sign of the absolute paid amount: either inpayment (+, debit) or outpayment (-, credit).

cgcloud__Phase__c.description: Workflow neutral description of the order entry status.

cgcloud__Pricing_Date__c.description: Enables tracking of the conditions that were used. By default: current day. It can be changed if the order was taken on paper first and was then added to the system after a price change.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_1__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_2__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_3__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_4__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_5__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_6__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_7__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_8__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_9__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_10__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores calculated value at the order level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Information__c.description: Stores the pricing information (found conditions) that are directly related to the order.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the Detail page of the Order record.

cgcloud__Release_Geolocation__Latitude__.description: Geolocation (latitude) that's to be fulfilled by mobility devices, and is not displayed on the order UI.

cgcloud__Release_Geolocation__Longitude_.description: Geolocation (longitude) that's to be fulfilled by mobility devices, and is not displayed on the order UI.

cgcloud__Release_Geolocation__c.description: Geolocation (latitude and longitude) that's to be fulfilled by mobility devices, and is not displayed on the order UI.

cgcloud__Release_Platform__c.description: Platform that can be used to release the order.

cgcloud__Release_Time__c.description: Date and time on which the sales document was released.

cgcloud__Selected_Rewards__c.description: Stores mobility selected rewards and related items or products in JSON format.

cgcloud__Total_Value__c.description: Total value (domestic currency) of the order including item discounts, without sales taxes.

cgcloud__Tour__c.description: This field looks up to Tour.

cgcloud__Value__c.description: Value of the order entry in the order or receipt currency.

cgcloud__Visit__c.description: Reference to the call in which the sales document is created.

cgcloud__Warehouse__c.description: Warehouse from which the customer is to be delivered.

cgcloud__Wholesaler__c.description: Reference to the wholesaler of the account.
